search.name: BLM GLO Land Patents
search.description:
Search the BLM GLO Records
Switches:
/state - Limit the search to a specified state
Examples:
blm jones
blm jones, francis
blm jones, francis /state il

form.name: blmf
form.COMMENT:
The input element above, "f1", was a SELECT element with the following options...
ALABAMA ALASKA ARIZONA ARKANSAS CALIFORNIA COLORADO FLORIDA IDAHO ILLINOIS INDIANA IOWA KANSAS LOUISIANA MICHIGAN MINNESOTA MISSISSIPPI MISSOURI MONTANA NEBRASKA NEVADA NEW JERSEY NEW MEXICO NORTH DAKOTA OHIO OKLAHOMA OREGON SOUTH DAKOTA TEXAS UTAH WASHINGTON WASHINGTON, DC WISCONSIN WYOMING -------------- ALL STATES --------------

The input element above, "f10", was a SELECT element with the following options...
------ All Counties ------

The input element above, "f16", was a SELECT element with the following options...
Any Dir N S

The input element above, "f18", was a SELECT element with the following options...
Any Dir E W

The input element above, "f19", was a SELECT element with the following options...
---- All Meridians ----

The input element above, "f21", was a SELECT element with the following options...
Any Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec

The input element above, "f11", was a SELECT element with the following options...
---- All Land Offices ----

The input element above, "f12", was a SELECT element with the following options...
---- All Authorities ----

The input element above, "f25", was a SELECT element with the following options...
Patentee Name State County Issue Date Land Office Document Number Accession/Serial Number

The input element above, "f26", was a SELECT element with the following options...
Accession/Serial Number Location
The input element above, "f24" was a set of radio buttons with the following options... "GENEALOGY", "TITLE"
